items.sentence: Tom was a very careful driver, but he still died in a traffic accident.
Tom was sitting by himself at a table near the window, drinking coffee.
I came to Boston three years ago and I\'ve been living here ever since.
I can\'t fix all of these problems, but I can fix some of the problems.
Tom told Mary to go next door and see if the neighbors needed any help.
Tom wanted to tell Mary what he really thought, but he held his tongue.
I checked on Tom\'s background and he seems to be a well-respected man.
Tom could\'ve gone anywhere in the world, but he chose to stay at home.
Tom couldn\'t shake the feeling that something bad was going to happen.
Tom told Mary he had a headache even though he didn\'t really have one.
